title: Edu Ministry, NUST collaborate to train next generation of Chip Designer
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 26 (APP):The Ministry of Federal Education and Professional Training and National University of Sciences and Technology (NUST) are pleased to announce a groundbreaking initiative to train a batch of chip designers in Pakistan.
According to the Education Ministry, this pioneering program aims to develop a skilled workforce in the field of chip design, a critical component of the global technology ecosystem.
The program, funded by the Ministry of Federal Education, will provide comprehensive training to a select group of students at NUSTâ€™s renowned College of Electrical and Mechanical Engineering.
The curriculum will cover the latest advancements in chip design, including system-on-chip (SoC) design, verification, and validation.
